title: Second Date Update PT 2: Did He Ghost Her Because He Thought She Was Someone Else?!
description:
Tommy reached out to Will via text message to ask him what happened that night and why he hadn’t been talking to Robin. Tommy tells Will that Robin said she had a good time when they went out for drinks, but noticed that when he arrived, he seemed to be bothered and a bit distracted – The chemistry wasn’t the same as it was at the party, and she was worried that she may have done something to annoy him.
